# Freelance MCP Server

A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that integrates with Claude Desktop to provide AI-powered freelance work management capabilities.

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ” **Smart Gig Search** - Find freelance opportunities across Upwork, Fiverr, Freelancer & more
- ğŸ¤– **AI Proposal Generation** - Create personalized proposals using ChatGroq LLM
- ğŸ’° **Rate Negotiation** - Get AI-powered negotiation strategies and messages
- ğŸ‘¤ **Profile Optimization** - Analyze and improve your freelance profiles
- ğŸ’» **Code Review Tools** - Review code quality with automated suggestions
- ğŸ› **Code Debugging** - Automatically fix common code issues
- ğŸ“Š **Application Tracking** - Monitor and analyze your application performance
- ğŸ“ˆ **Market Insights** - Access real-time freelance market trends

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

1. Get a free GROQ API key from [console.groq.com](https://console.groq.com/)
2. Add to Claude Desktop config
3. Start finding gigs and generating proposals!

## ğŸ› ï¸ Built With

- Python 3.8+
- FastMCP (Model Context Protocol)
- LangChain + ChatGroq (AI capabilities)
- Pydantic (Data validation)
